org.eso.ias.plugin.publisher.impl

Class KafkaPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eso.ias.plugin.publisher.PublisherBase
      • org.eso.ias.plugin.publisher.impl.KafkaPublisher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MonitorPointSender

    public class KafkaPublisher
extends PublisherBase
    The publisher of monitor point values through Kafka.

    KafkaPublisher is an unbuffered publisher because Kafka already does its own buffering and optimizations.

    Kafka topic is hardcoded in defaultTopicName property

    Author:
    acaproni

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.eso.ias.plugin.publisher.MonitorPointSender

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String defaultTopicName
      The topic name for kafka publisher (in the actual implementation all the plugins publish on the same topic but each one has its own partition).
      static java.lang.String KAFKA_CONFIG_FILE_DEFAULT_PATH
      The default path of the kafka provided configuration file
      static java.lang.String KAFKA_CONFIG_FILE_PROP_NAME
      The name of the property to set the path of the kafka provided configuration file
      static java.lang.String KAFKA_PARTITION_PROP_NAME
      The name of the (required) java property to set the number of the partition
      static java.lang.String KAFKA_TOPIC_PROP_NAME
      The name of the java property to set the kafka topic.
      static java.lang.String topicName
      The topic name red from the passed property if exists, or the default.
